main event: A civilian couple observed a flying disc while driving near Placerville, California on August 14, 1947.
interesting points: The object was described as polished chrome and approximately 5 feet long with a shiny metallic appearance., It was seen moving at a high speed and seemed to perform a shallow dive., The observation included a white smoke trail, and the object disappeared in a puff of dark gray smoke., The couple was able to identify the landing location of the object about 100 feet below a hill., The sighting occurred in a clear blue sky, making it more distinctive.
witness description: a civilian couple driving on Cedar Spring Road, 4 to 5 miles southeast of Placerville.
